==Trivia==
* Using this skill's Normal Attacks and Charged Attacks near most NPCs will cause them to clap.
** Plunging Attacks cause them to flinch if Kokomi is close enough during the entire Plunging Attack.
===Etymology===
*The Chinese and Japanese names of the attack {{Lang|zh=水有常形|zh_rm=Shuǐ Yǒu Cháng Xíng|zh_tl=Water Has a Constant Shape|ja=水の常形|ja_rm=Mizu no Joukei|ja_tl=The Constant Shape of Water|sort=zh,ja}} are references to the phrase {{Lang|"water has no constant shape"|zh=水无常形|zh_tl=shuǐ wú cháng xíng}} from {{w|Sun Tzu}}'s ''{{w|The Art of War}}'', the greatest military treatise in China, written around the 5th century BC.
